Text: Hiking and Miscellaneous InformationElizabeth We leave for Aspen this Saturday I like to borrow your information on hiking trails in the area especially the Mt Sopris trail Thanks Marc

FW Bill Moyers MOYERS IN CONVERSATIONTo All Please see transcript for Moyers in Conversation with Robert Lipton America Responds section wwwpbsorgamericarespondsmoyershtml I believe the perspective is interesting and correct Let me know what you think Marc MOYERS IN CONVERSATION Broadcast September BILL MOYERS BM Its been almost a week now and the questions continue to pile up What kind of people would do this What do they want How do we witness death on this scale and go on with our lives What do we do about the rage we feel What does it mean to realize how vulnerable we suddenly are My guest tonight is uniquely qualified to help us answer these questions Robert Lifton has wrestled with some of the most disturbing events of the time Trained in psychology and psychiatry years ago he went to Hiroshima to listen to the survivors of the worlds first nuclear bombing explosion His book won the National Book Award Original Message From Public Affairs mailto Sent Thursday September PM To Subject RE Bill Moyers MOYERS IN CONVERSATION Thank you for your comments about Moyers in Conversation All transcripts guests information and names are posted on the pbsorg website under the America Responds section wwwpbsorgamericarespondsmoyershtml We hope that you find this information helpful Best wishes Joelle Jaffe Public Affairs Television Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday September AM To Subject Bill Moyers MOYERS IN CONVERSATION User Information Name Marc Sekula Zip Code Email Program Name Bill Moyers MOYERS IN CONVERSATION Nature of Comments neutral Mailing List Optin Wants previews on Wants catalog Comments Type your comments here limit I could not find information on your website regarding the September Bill Moyers coverage of the terrorist attacks on the United States that on which he had a conversation I believe with a professor from NYU I would like to get a transript of that conversation the name of that individual plus a list of books articles etc this individual may have written The conversation focused on religious fundamentalism The dialogue was very enlightening Thanks for your help in providing the requested information Marc Sekula Cortlandt Houston Texas Please helthis Catalog Name Marc Sekula Catalog Street Address Cortlandt Catalog City Houston Catalog State Texas Catalog Zip Code
